channel.title: Auto runner
channel.description:
Hi i was wondering if you can make simple runner that will go trade whit some1, get the items and go to bank them, and over and over again. this will be realy cool.
EDIT:: Walk to a place, trade whit a specific player, accept the tread, go to bank, put everything in bank, get it all noted, go back, trade to the player, give noted for unnnoted, go bank, .. and so on till the end of time.
Or it will be better if any1 is willing to teack me some scripting on scar, coz its too complicated for me, even to run a simple script. I can't get it how it works. I am so n00b then i can't even start a script. I have tryed some scripts, but nothing. if any1 help me understant how to make it walk around and trade ill pay back once i make what i want whit the script.

item.title: Auto runner
item.dc:creator: @bitBG bitBG
item.description:
@bitBG wrote:

i mean i have restarted the PC at least 3 times and i have loged in and out like over 10 times per try. so i have loged in and out in totale of 30 times or so. and i had the same colores.

anyways i need a script that will work just around the bank. no need to go away from it. just in and out of the bank. thats 2 or 3 screens of totale area where it will walk. and if the changing colour is the problem, if it so hard to make them variable and set them manualy each time?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto runner
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

dude every time rs2 loads it changes colors. u were just standing in the same place and didnt get a loading…please wait or u just kept the same rs screen up and didnt change.

Read full topic

well i have tryed 3 times running a script and when i was picking colors they where all the same ea time.

item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

no im srry but no one can do this

why, becasue the new engine update changes colors on every loading plz wait, so we cant walk long distances

item.title: Auto runner
item.dc:creator: @bitBG bitBG
item.description:
@bitBG wrote:

lol
are you going to help, or you just want to spam my tread?!?!?

I realy need a scritp to do at least:
from bank:
go out of bank;
trade some1 (to be variable so i can set who);
accept trade;
go in bank;
deposit all;
get out;
trade and accept;
go deposit;
…
and so on.
hope some1 will help me.

Read full topic

yeah, but not all the way

item.description:
@bitBG wrote:

actualy i wanted iron ore runner; yew log runner; lobs runner; ess runner (didn’t touth about it till now)
they are all the same to make. if you have one of them you have all just change paths and items

item.title: Auto runner
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

doesnt anyoen know about ess running

world something air
world 66 laws

you get 27 unoted ess and trade it with a crafter for 27 noted ess and 27 runes

thats what he wants
